# City Council

## About the City Council

Jurupa Valley is a General Law City that is governed by a five-member City Council. Members of the City Council are elected by district for a four-year term. Each year, the City Council selects one of its members to serve as Mayor and one member to serve as Mayor Pro Tem. The Mayor presides over all council meetings and is the ceremonial head of the City for official functions. 

An official [Notice of Reorganization (PDF)](https://www.jurupavalley.org/DocumentCenter/View/3793) is published and circulated each year.

## Meetings

- 7:00 p.m.
- First and third Thursday of the month
- City Hall Council Chambers  
  8930 Limonite Avenue  
  Jurupa Valley, CA 92509

## Agendas &amp; Minutes

The complete City Council Agenda is posted on this website the Monday prior to the scheduled Thursday meeting. 

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.jurupavalley.org/AgendaCenter/City-Council-2) | View Past [Agendas](https://97.93.171.115/WebLink/0/fol/24418/Row1.aspx) and [Minutes](https://97.93.171.115/WebLink/0/fol/24419/Row1.aspx)

Note: Due to the varying sizes of our agenda packets and your internet speed there may be a delay in opening the file. Thank you for your patience as the file loads.

## Videos

The City Council meetings are streamed live with recording available within 48 hours of the meeting ending. Please visit the [Meeting Videos](https://www.jurupavalley.org/422/Meeting-Videos) page to see live and archived footage of meetings.
